CustomField.description: Contingency Type originally lived on the Contract object. We now need to be able to report better by using checkboxes and by making this live on the deferral object to allow for more granularity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The customer has ownership of the solution through a specific date. Thereafter, the customer must take affirmative action to 'own' the solution.
CustomField.label: Contingent - POC
